references.paper_title: Improved algorithms for linear stochastic bandits
references.reason: This paper provides foundational algorithms for linear contextual bandits, which are fundamental to the neural contextual bandits discussed in this paper.

references.paper_title: Finite-time analysis of the multiarmed bandit problem
references.reason: This paper is a seminal work in the multi-armed bandit problem, providing the fundamental theoretical framework for contextual bandit algorithms.

references.paper_title: A convergence theory for deep learning via over-parameterization
references.reason: This paper provides theoretical justification for using over-parameterized neural networks, which is a key assumption in the analysis of neural contextual bandit algorithms.
This paper introduces robust bandit optimization methods that are tolerant to adversarial corruptions, a crucial aspect addressed in this paper.

references.paper_title: Neural contextual bandits with UCB-based exploration
references.reason: This paper is a key work on neural contextual bandits, which serves as the basis for many of the techniques used in this paper.
